Action.author: caod
Action.body: It doesn't need to go into the collection criteria for that. We still have access to the txid for logging purposes.

Action.author: ales
Action.body: It doesn't seem to be used anywhere so yeah, let's remove it. Incidentally: does CollectionCriteria even need to be a protobuf? Do we send it over the wire or marshal it anywhere?

Action.author: caod
Action.body: Doesn't look like it, I'll change this issue to remove it from the protos and move the type to CollectionStore since it seems to be mostly used there.
